Name: This Game Might Improve Your Memory
About the game: In Brief: A simple reporter searching for the paranormal... A small town energized with the visit of a great figure... Locals that look upon the visitors with apathy... (except that one hotel clerk that either likes the visitors a little too much, or has a sick sense of humor) This is the setting for this B-rated-horror-movie based point-and-click adventure game. (also, this game is a short, experimental game designed to teach memory techniques, so it MIGHT improve your memory) Features: Playtime: ~ 3 hours. Resolution: 320 x 200 scaled up 960x600 (can be configured) Language: English text only OS: Windows only Gameplay: About 50% tutorials for mnemonics 50% story driven adventure game As much text as a novella Original Soundtrack
